and , my best friend is abigail.

content.text: I love Halloween because it is the only time of year when I can dress up and be someone else.
I agree! It is so much fun to be able to let go and be creative.
What do you usually dress up as?
Last year I was a zombie, and the year before I was a princess.
Oh fun! I love the zombie costume idea.
My wife is a breast cancer survivor, so I do a lot of work to support breast cancer research and awareness.
That is so kind of you. I am sure it means a lot to your wife.
It does. She is a very strong woman.
Good for her! I am glad she is doing well.
Thank you. What do you do for work?
I am a photographer. I love taking pictures of people and places.
That sounds like a really fun job! I would love to see some of your photos.
Sure! I will send you some of my favorites.
Thanks! I love seeing other people's photos
